caller_intent: Verify renewal details for a homeowners policy, confirm coverage, check payment status, and request a declaration page email.
resolution_steps: Agent looked up the policy using the provided policy number (5628250800).
Confirmed policy details: active, renews November 15, 2025, coverage of $287,000 with a $5,000 deductible.
Noted no mortgage information on the policy and explained a written request is needed to update it.
Checked payment status: premium paid on November 13, 2025, for $880 with a $0 balance.
Agreed to email a hard copy of the declaration page to Valen@ihaveinsurance.com.
summary: Sarah from Valen Mortgage verified her homeowners policy details, confirmed payment status, and requested a declaration page email. Agent Jamie Flippin provided all requested information and arranged for the document to be emailed. The call concluded with Sarah satisfied and no further action needed.
